title: The Outbreak
description: Lily Hamilton is struggling to survive in a world filled with zombies, something she thought only existed in movies. Living on her own, she's doing anything and everything she can to survive. But, when things seem to be getting back to a normal she can live with, she's uprooted from everything she's ever known. But, has her world been one horrible lie? Cover photograph copyright Â© 2013 by Ivan Bliznetsov
author: Tayler Wright
